verbs.description: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend [V: have] just donated $ 72,000 for each member of their family to a civil rights organization in honor of President Donald Trump 's 72nd birthday .

[ARG0: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend] have [ARGM-TMP: just] [V: donated] [ARG1: $ 72,000] [ARGM-GOL: for each member of their family] [ARGM-GOL: to a civil rights organization] [ARGM-PRP: in honor of President Donald Trump 's 72nd birthday] .
